about_the_game:
Story

A group of scientists hired by a powerful military corporation in order to create a serum that improves the physical and regenerative abilities of soldiers. As a result of a fatal mistake, a new and dangerous virus was created. The virus affects the human mind, depriving it of its ability to think and awakens incredible aggression. In addition, due to its regenerative abilities, the pathogen keeps the host alive even with fatal wounds... Due to the favorable conditions, the virus has multiplied extremely fast within the walls of the laboratory and soon got out. Humanity was faced with a new threat that could end civilization.

About the game

In «From The Bunker», you play as a small group of survivors who are lucky enough to find shelter. But this is not enough, because soon you will be visited by the infected, marauders and other enemies who want to take away your shelter. You will have to wisely mange resources, upgrade and defend your bunker, explore the map, look for items necessary for survival, build relationships with other survivors, and much more.

The game will constantly create situations in which you will have to make a choice. Help or harm? Kill or be killed? Save yourself or help a comrade? Only your decision determines whether you will see the next day, or whether the world will be missing another group of survivors.

The world around you has a life of its own. The weather conditions may differ, the sunny day can be changed to a rainy one, or even a thunderstorm. Survivors around you expand their territories, form alliances or fight each other. Hordes of zombies swarm into neighborhoods, threatening people. Take your place in the world.

Features

  • Gloomy bunker atmosphere
  • Dozens of characters with their own history, characteristics, features
  • Random map and game events generation
  • Each game session is unique
  • Living game world
  • Hundreds of game events and hundreds of consequences
  • Weather conditions affect gameplay
  • Manage unique characters
  • Explore the map
  • Build relationships with other survivors
  • Make decisions
  • Craft weapons, equipment, and survival items
  • Improve and furnish your bunker
  • Hunt, fish, grow vegetables, pick berries, find a way to feed yourself and your comrades
  • Protect yourself and your bunker

name: From The Bunker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual-Core - Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / Athlon 64 X2 6000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3.1 GHZ DUAL-CORE, INTEL® CORE I3 / AMD Phenom II X6 1055T 2.8-3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, Radeon HD 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: In «From The Bunker» you play as a group of survivors who have found a fortified bunker and are trying to survive in a world filled with the living dead. You'll have to explore the map in search of resources, fight off threats and build relationships with factions. Do whatever it takes to survive!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
